main event: On December 20, 1955, a winged-shaped object with red, blue, green, and white lights was observed in Decatur, Nebraska, moving at great speed.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 3 minutes,The object displayed spots resembling arms and a tail,The report included descriptions of multiple sightings that occurred on January 7 around 8:30 PM,Two sightings involved lights that moved in peculiar ways and vanished,One object was characterized as cylindrical and metallic with a pulsating orange light.
witness description: Witness described the object as circular and metallic, with a diameter of approximately 50 feet and thickness of 10-15 feet.
